fields.label: Treatment Archive Instructions
fields.message:
This component will pull in all treatments that are set up on the main site.
To set the icons, section titles, and category descriptions:
Go to Treatments, Categories, and select the category you want to edit.
Parent categories get Icon and Title.
Child categories are sub categories.
Grandchild categories are the cards that will show description and locations.
The locations on the cards are selected on each sites individual treatments.
